text:
Hello. I need some help on configuring the Cookie Policy Banner.
We noticed that the button "Accept" only accept necessary cookies, while we want our users to accept all cookies ideally
Is there a way to change the default values of the toggles "Analytics", "Advertisement", "Functional" to be enabled?

I investigated the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/cookie-banner|Cookies Events API> and looked into the javascript source code, but I don't find how it could be achieved

There'a a broken link on this page: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/crm-objects> `using the properties API.` goes to <https://53.HubSpotpreview-na1.com/docs/api/crm/properties>
but bad timing, I need that page lol
Away from computer atm. Not sure why the link broke will make sure we fix that
